sentences: Ryan Loftsgaarden (born May 19, 1988), commonly known by his stage name Ryan Lofty, is an American producer, composer and songwriter.
After college Lofty worked as a composer at Disney's creative campus in Los Angeles eventually leaving to facilitate a songwriting contract in India.

Bonx) won Insomniac Events' Discovery Project with the award of a one-hour DJ set at Life Is Beautiful (music festival) in Las Vegas, opening the stage for Felix Jaehn, Robin Schulz, and Porter Robinson.
On the day, Lofty performed a surprise collaboration with Bill Nye the Science Guy who was booked to speak at the event about climate change.
In early 2016 Lofty released eight-track album Tourists from the Future which featured American Idol alumni Casey Abrams and Mansions on the Moon vocalist Ted Wendler.

In 2018, Lofty announced a collaboration with composer Jay Vincent, writing electronic music and songs for DreamWorks Animation's Harvey Street Kids, a Netflix Original series based on characters from the legacy Harvey Comics franchise.
